# Sudoku Game

A simple web-based Sudoku game created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
The game runs directly in the browser with no external libraries or installation.

## Features

* Automatically generated Sudoku puzzles
* Three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard
* Timer to track progress
* Mistake counter
* Hint system
* Pause and resume functionality
* Keyboard and mouse support

## How to Use

1. Save the code as `index.html`.
2. Open the file in any modern web browser.
3. Start playing.

No setup or additional tools are required.

## Controls

* Click on a cell to select it
* Use on-screen buttons or keyboard to enter numbers
* Press Backspace, Delete, or 0 to clear a cell
* Use the Hint button for help
* Pause the game anytime
